answerText: Kronig-Penny Model[10] The wave function in the Kronig-Penny Model can be solved by using this theorem that states that the wavefunction for an electron in a periodic potential of x plus the lattice constant d equals e to the i k d times wave function of x.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Harvard  | 12 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This model can be used to approximate energy band gaps. For 10 points each: [10] Name this model from quantum physics which consists of an infinite series of square wells.
